data.name: CYCLE
data.detailed_description:
CYCLE is a game that follows Lana, a 22 year old woman who recently lost her mother to unknown causes. Her mother was on a journey to restore energy back to the Tower of the Stars, which provides the energy to the country they live in. After her mother did not return, Lana decides to try and find out the truth herself, and embark on the journey to the Tower of the Stars herself.

CYCLE is an exploration-based platformer, in which the player is invited to explore the world in order to find items and abilities that will help them traverse the world more easily and reach new places. The game is inspired by the Mega Man Zero series, aswell as titles in the Metroidvania genre of games.

data.short_description: Help Lana find the truth about her mother's death in this exploration-based platformer game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
